name: Monsterfall
description:
Monsterfall is a game in which you compete against other monsters to find who the best monster in the monsterfall is. You take control of one of six characters, each with their own set of characteristics and abilities.

This game was created as the final project at Da Vinci High School in 2018.

FEATURES

  • 6 monsters to choose.
  • 2 abilities for each monster.
  • One "Sudden Death" mechanic
  • Round stats and leaderboard

CONTROLS

2-4 players. Works ONLY with joysticks.

CREDITS

Artists: Maximiliano García, Darío Coló & Valentina Barraza

Programming: Lautaro Bravo de la Serna
